SCENE_VIEWER.Loading.Title: Loading
SCENE_VIEWER.Settings.Hints.RightClick: Adds an option to preview the scene to the right click context menu.  Otherwise, the scene can be accessed by ctrl+right click.  REQUIRES LIBWRAPPER.  Will not work with anything else that changes the right click menu on any compendiums
SCENE_VIEWER.Settings.Hints.ClosePreviou: When previewing a scene, closes other popouts from this module.
SCENE_VIEWER.NoImage: Compendium Scene Viewer | This Scene does not have a background image
